name: ScienceConsult BV
legal: BV ('besloten vennootschap' according to Dutch law)
membership: Professional societies related to food safety, nutrition, bioeconomy.
memberOrga: ScienceConsult BV has no members, only customers
goal: ScienceConsult offers over twenty years of experience in health-related science and its management, both in food/beverage and biomedicine. Key areas of expertise are general management and worldwide representation of an international scientific institute, stakeholder interactions, food/beverage regulatory affairs, food safety, nutrition, product development, marketing support, business development, second opinions and strategic support. ScienceConsult has access to a large scientific network in the food and beverage industry, government and academia.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food safety policy.
Nutrition policy, e.g. health claims regulation.
EFSA opinions and guidelines.
EFSA stakeholder initiatives.
